model_path.help: Path to the base model to run stable diffusion on. If evaluates to .ckpt or .safetensor file will convert to and use a huggingface diffusers model stored in ./models

embeddings_path.help: Path to directory containing embedding files.

prompt_file.help: A file storing the prompt. --prompt flag must not be set to use this

negative_prompt_file.help: A file storing the negative prompt. --negative_prompt flag must not be set to use this

seed.help: Seed. If seed is -1 a random seed will be generated and used

out_dir.help: path to store generated images and generation data

out_name.help: name added to output file along with its seed. Will store as <out_dir>/<out_name><seed>.png

embed_prompts.help: For longer prompts with 77 or more tokens use this flag to first make them embeddings.

help_list_lora.help: Use this flag to find and list lora. This will only look in the models/lora directory.

help_list_models.help: Use this flag to find and list lora. This will only look in the models/lora directory.

allow_tf32.help: inference will go faster with slight inaccuracy

no_gen_data.help: Setting this flag prevents generation data from being stored with images

image_path.help: if task is img2img, this path indicates the input image

image_strength.help: if task is img2img, this path indicates the input image

vae_path.help: path to custom vae file. If none is provided, will attempt to use default.

pose_path.help: path to custom pose file. If none is provided, will attempt to use default.
